EmailTemplate.name: PREPARE No Show (Somali)
EmailTemplate.subject: Missed training
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Ku {!CampaignMember.FirstName},
Sida uu muujinaayo diinwaankeena, waxaad seegtay tababarka {!CampaignMember.c501_cm__Training_Name__c} taariikhda {!CampaignMember.c501_cm__Training_Start_DateTime__c}. La participación en esta capacitación es obligatoria para completar el programa PREPARE for Care. Ka qayb-galka tababarkaan waa qasab si aad u dhammeyso Barnaamajka PREPARE for Care. Fadlan la xiriir prepareforcare@imaginewa.org si aad ka wada hadashaan habab suurtogal ah aad la qabsan kartid shuruudaha barnaamijka.
-The Imagine Institute
www.imaginewa.org
{!$Setup.c501_cm__Imagine_Settings__c.c501_cm__Email_SMS_Unsub_Text__c}
